en: You've heard mutterings online about taxes for self-employed people being much higher than generally anticipated. You can set aside a large portion of money for taxes now, or take the risk to see if you make enough to pay it off in the future. Set aside some savings?
You decide it's not the time to go up against the government and set aside a few thousand dollars.
You bite your lip and hope you'll work hard enough to recoup the cost of taxes by the time they're due. But every now and then, you remember the risk and your heart skips a beat.
